name: Tzar: The Burden of the Crown
description:
This script require windows installer from GOG.com.
Please install the game with the default settings and click exit.
After installation,  the game setting manager will be run - you can change the settings and exit.
notes: In-game music does not work. Disable music in the game settings.

files.installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Tzar/Tzar.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: mfc42
    description: Installing mfc42...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: false
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Tzar...
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Running game settings manager...
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Tzar/Setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 1024x768
